title: What is EdXposed, and what can you do with it on your Android device?
content:
Magisk modules are a simple way to apply system-level mods to your device without having to make changes to your system files manually. All you have to do is download the module, activate it through the Magisk app, and then reboot your device for the changes to go into effect. Most modules focus on adding

The post What is EdXposed, and what can you do with it on your Android device? appeared first on XDA.
description: Wondering how to use EdXposed? Here's how to install this Riru module through Magisk and what you can do with the framework.
